summary: Mod that makes males in Skyrim look a tad bit more realistic.
descriptionHtml:
You tired of being that sleek ninja... looking like a junky?
Or want an athletic, healthy and realistic looking character and it tends to become Arnold?
Well thats what i want to fix.

Currently this mod is under development! Will be updating you guys on the progress.

Goals:
Make new mesh and texture with a sleek, athletic muscular look.
Create a bodyslider for men
Make it compatible with as many mods as possible

Any help is greatly appreciated as i have NO experience of visual modding and will be learning from SCRATCH. Yes, I am very enthusiastic about it and yes I know I will be going through hell to get this done.
author: Caveman
